explanation: The stage direction 'Il sautille sous ces fenêtres, [sa viole à la main.]' describes the character's movement, specifically hopping or skipping under windows, which fits into the 'movement' category. Although it mentions an object (sa viole à la main), the primary focus is on the action of moving.
stgdir: Il sautille sous ces fenêtres, [sa viole à la main.]
